meanings.definition: Not having been put through a filter.
meanings.sent1: The unfiltered water from the stream tasted fresh.
meanings.sent2: I prefer unfiltered coffee for its strong flavor.
meanings.sent3: The unfiltered sunlight made the room too bright.
meanings.sent4: Her unfiltered emotions showed in her tear-streaked face.
meanings.sent5: The unfiltered truth hit him like a ton of bricks.

meanings.sent1: The unfiltered news report shocked the viewers.
meanings.sent2: I like to hear unfiltered opinions to understand different perspectives.
meanings.sent3: His unfiltered laughter echoed through the room.
meanings.sent4: The unfiltered chaos of the city streets overwhelmed her senses.
meanings.sent5: The unfiltered power of nature was on full display during the storm.
